name: Sentret
flavorText:
A very cautious
POKéMON, it raises
itself up using its tail to get a
better view of its
surroundings.

previous.name: Feraligatr
previous.flavorText:
When it bites with
its massive and
powerful jaws, it shakes its head
and savagely tears
its victim up.

next.name: Furret
next.flavorText:
It makes a nest to
suit its long and
skinny body. The nest is impossible
for other POKéMON
to enter.
